transcript.speaker: suhasini-chandramouli
transcript.text: Thank you. Good day everyone and welcome to the Apple Q4 FY2024 Earnings Conference Call.

transcript.speaker: tim-cook
transcript.text: Thank you Suhasini, and good afternoon everyone. Today Apple is reporting revenue of $94.9 billion, up 6 percent from a year ago, and a new September quarter record.

transcript.speaker: tim-cook
transcript.text: iPhone revenue grew 6 percent to $46.2 billion, driven by strong customer response to iPhone 16 lineup.

transcript.speaker: tim-cook
transcript.text: Services revenue reached an all-time high of $25 billion, growing 12 percent year over year.

transcript.speaker: luca-maestri
transcript.text: Earnings per share was $1.64, which represents a new September quarter record and beat analyst estimates.

transcript.speaker: luca-maestri
transcript.text: Our installed base of active devices reached a new all-time high, surpassing 2.2 billion devices.
